title: Group of three men including clergyman wearing dark jacket and clerical collar, seated at tables with light colored tablecloths, microphones, and name cards inscribed "Mr. Holmes", "Mr. Macdona", "Fr. Gallagher", and "Mr. Munn", man (possibly Mr. Macdona) standing behind podium with microphone, inscribed "Penn Sheraton Hotel", in interior with audience of men and women, light colored organic patterned carpet, dark curtains with light colored floral pattern, light colored walls, and cone shaped wall sconces, and decorative metal railing across second floor balcony in background, view looking down
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
